string-array.name: mode_entries
string-array.item: 0 : Samsung Galaxy Series, HTC Desire / Nexus One Series (overwritten: 3, 13)
2 : Motorola DROID Pro / DROID 3 Atrix Series (overwritten: 0, 10)
99 : Try ONLY modes 0 and 1 were unsuccessful (overwritten: 2, 3, 12, 13)

string-array.name: emergency_entries
string-array.item: 1 : Disable display of "Emergency calls only"\n*May result in an error when patching some devices
2 : Enable display of "Emergency calls only"\n*restores original behavior after patching
